version.description: The version number of this JSON schema

name.description: The name given to this test set

time.description: The number of seconds it took to execute the test set

test_suite_id.description: The test suite ID associated with this test set

definition_uri.description: The URI where this test set definition is stored

vcs_commit.description: The VCS commit value if the $definition_uri field is a VCS URI

metadata.description: Free form object where to store accessory test set data

test_case.description: The list of test case objects executed by this test set

parameters.description: Free form object to store key-value pairs describing the parameters used to run the test set

defect_url.description: The URL where the defect for this test set can be found

defect_comment.description: A free-form description of the defect

defect_ack.description: If the defect is known or not
